articles.title: Pyongyang declaration signed by Mexican political party
articles.content:
Pyongyang declaration signed by Mexican political party 
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Mexico signed the Pyongyang declaration "Let us defend and advance the cause of socialism."
 Delegates to a meeting of the national preparatory committee of the 2nd congress of the party on May 25 deliberated on a report of its chairman about the fraternal relations between his party and the Workers' Party of Korea, the present world situation and achievements the Korean people made in socialist construction by embodying the Juche idea which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and is being developed and enriched by Kim Jong Il and adopted a political decision.    
 The decision quoted the full text of the Pyongyang declaration, saying the socialist party of Mexico signs it in reflection of the firm will to defend and advance the socialist cause.

British diplomats visit Mt. Jongbang Recreation Ground
articles.content:
British diplomats visit Mt. Jongbang Recreation Ground 
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Ambassador David Arthur Slinn and officials of the British embassy here visited the Mt. Jongbang Recreation Ground in North Hwanghae Province on June 10 on the occasion of the official birthday of the queen of the UK, its National Day.
 Being briefed on the fact that Mt. Jongbang has turned into a famous scenic spot and peculiar cultural recreation ground for the people under the warm loving care of Kim Jong Il, they looked round the Jongbang Tea House, an angling site, the Songbul Temple built in 898 and other places.

articles.title: Reception given by Russian Consul General
articles.content:
Reception given by Russian Consul General 
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Arkady Ravrov, Russian Consul General to Chongjin, hosted a reception Tuesday evening on the occasion of the National Day of Russia.
 Present on invitation were Choe Ki Dok, vice-chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, and officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made there.

Greetings to Philippine `President
articles.content:
Greetings to Philippine `President
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Gloria Macapagal Arroyo, President of the Philippines, on the occasion of its 105th National Day.
 Kim in the message wished the president greater success in her responsible work for the political stability and prosperity of the country and expressed the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in different fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Secretary of Foreign Affairs of Philippines
articles.content:
Greetings to Secretary of Foreign Affairs of Philippines
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Philippine counterpart Blas F. Ople on the occasion of its 105th National Day.
 In the belief that the friendly ties between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message sincerely wished the secretary fresh success in his work.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Togo
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Togo
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 9 sent a congratulatory message to Gnassingbe Eyadema upon his reelection as President of Togo.
 Kim in the message expressed the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations existing between the two countries would grow stronger and develop and sincerely wished the president greater success in his responsible work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Message of sympathy to Syrian President
articles.content:
Message of sympathy to Syrian President
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 9 sent a message of sympathy to Syrian President Bashar al Assad on the occasion of the 3rd death anniversary of Hafez al Assad.
 The message expressed warm and heart-felt sympathy to the president and, through him, to the Syrian government and people and the bereaved families.    
 Expressing the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would gain in scope and strength to meet the requirements of the new century, the message sincerely wished the president good health and happiness and the friendly Syrian people continued progress and prosperity.
